Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.persistence

Class Master

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.Behavior
      • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.persistence.Master
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public final class Master
extends Behavior
    The Master class defines a behavior that cyclically selects randomly a Worker actor until the number of selected actor becomes equal to the number of workers. Moreover, after the selection of the worker, the master cyclically sends it a message and waits for the answer until the number of sent messages becomes equal to the a predefined value.
    See Also:
    Worker, Serialized Form
